Package org.spongepowered.api.event.entity

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BulkEntityEvent
    An event that involves multiple entities at once.
    EntityAboutToConstructEvent
    Represents an event where an entity is about to be constructed and may be spawned in a world.
    EntityBreakBlockEvent
    Called when an Entity breaks a BlockLoc.
    EntityBreedEvent
    Represents an event when two Ageable entities come together to attempt to produce offspring.
    EntityChangeBlockEvent
    Called when an Entity changes a BlockLoc.
    EntityChangeHealthEvent
    Called when the health of an Entity changes.
    EntityCollisionEvent
    Called when an Entity collides with something.
    EntityCollisionWithBlockEvent
    Called when an Entity collides with a BlockLoc.
    EntityCollisionWithEntityEvent
    Called when an Entity collides with another Entity.
    EntityConstructingEvent
    Called during the construction of a Entity.
    EntityDeathEvent
    Called when an Entity is killed or removed due to unload.
    EntityDismountEvent
    Raised when an entity dismounts another entity.
    EntityDropItemEvent
    Called when a player drops an item stack.
    EntityEnterPortalEvent
    An event when an entity enters a portal.
    EntityEquipEvent
    Raised when an entity equips an item.
    EntityEquipmentChangeEvent
    Called when an entity changes an equipped item.
    EntityEvent
    An event that whose target happens to be an entity.
    EntityExitPortalEvent
    An event when an entity exits a portal.
    EntityExpireEvent
    Called when an Entity is expiring from the world.
    EntityExplosionEvent
    Represents an event when an explosion already has taken place and blocks are about to be broken/affected.
    EntityHarvestBlockEvent
    Called when an Entity harvests a BlockLoc.
    EntityIgniteEvent
    An event that occurs when an entity becomes ignited.
    EntityInteractBlockEvent
    Called when a Entity interacts with a BlockLoc.
    EntityInteractEntityEvent
    Called when a Entity interacts with an Entity.
    EntityInteractEvent
    Called when an Entity is interacting with something.
    EntityItemConsumeEvent
    Called when an entity consumes an itemstack for any reason.
    EntityLeashEvent
    An event that is called when an entity becomes leashed.
    EntityMountEvent
    Raised when an entity mounts another entity.
    EntityMoveEvent
    Called when an Entity is moving.
    EntityPickUpItemEvent
    Called when a entity picks up an item(s).
    EntityPlaceBlockEvent
    Called when an Entity places a BlockLoc.
    EntityPotionEffectChangeEvent
    An event when an Entity gains or removes a PotionEffect.
    EntitySpawnEvent
    Raised when entities are spawned.
    EntityTameEvent
    Called when an Entity is tamed.
    EntityTargetEntityEvent
    Called when an Entity targets another entity.
    EntityTeleportEvent
    Called when an Entity teleports.
    EntityUnleashEvent
    An event that is called when an entity becomes unleashed.
    EntityUpdateEvent
    Called when an Entity is updated.
    ExplosionPrimeEvent
    Represents an event when an Explosive is about to explode.
    ProjectileLaunchEvent
    Called when a Projectile is launched.
